slider.overview:
Point Of Interest List Page

This page shows a list of different types of top-level POI types, namely: Attractions, Hotels, Restaurants, Nightlife & Shops.

feed.name: POI Search
feed.overview: Calls the POI Search feed using the current locationId combined with a type= of either ATTRACTION, RESTAURANT, DINING, NIGHTLIFE & SHOP.

feed.name: Destination Menu
feed.overview: Calls the destination menu feed by using the locationId in the request.
